resources.string: can not find the TF card
can not find the Internal Storage
Both the External and Internal Storage are invalibale!
confirm that you have started logging
confirm that you have stopped logging
error! we can not find any log.log file
do you want to save this file?
sure that the file: /dev/log/system and /dev/log/main have a other-user read permisstion!
TF card is ready to use!
you still not logging, sure let it background?
YOU WILL CLEAR ALL LOG FILES!!! SURE?
copy log files to TF card
press \"start\" to get a default name
file already exists!replace file(%1$d bytes) with file(%2$d bytes)?
文件大小是一个非法值

this application help you to print the system log message into files. 
Normal steps for logging: 
1)Press "Start" to start logging. 
2)Press "running background", let it run on back.Then do anything that you want, 
such as reappearing a bug or doing a long-time-test! 
3)Open this application,enter the name of the log file. 
4)Press "Save" to save the log file. 
By defaults, the log files will storage in /data/data/com.actions.logcat/log/. 
you can Press "copy log files to TF card" to copy it to the TF card.
there is too many log file in the storage, you can press \"clear all log file\" to clear it!
TF card is full now! retry it after clear some files.

"========================================
 === 该log文件一般情况下分为三部分：
 === 1)开始打印log的时刻系统的dumpstate信息.
 === 2)logcat信息（包括kernel信息）
 === 3)结束打印log的时刻系统的dumpstate信息 
 === 注：如果log没有正常保存（由于系统掉电等原因造成）将没有第
 === 三部分的信息。
 === 查看dumpstate信息可以通过搜索"dumpstate"直接跳转 。
 === 查看第2部分的logcat信息可以通过搜索"actionslogcat: start"直接跳转，
 =========================================
 "
